name: Squash (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Squash (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Nic D. and Harrison O.

The goal of this game is to descend down a dungeon and retake the Grail. However, the way down is full of goblins, your goal is to squash the goblins and to retake the Grail. Your main attack is done via “squashing” (jumping on) the enemy goblins. But be careful, enemies will attack you and drain your health, and if you get to 0 HP the game is over!

CONTROLS

W- hold to increase the power of the jump

A- move left

S- Makes the player move faster

D- moves right

PRESS SPACE TO RESTART THE GAME WHEN DEAD
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
